title: Bus people
creator_credit: Nicole Bloom, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: When you’re poor, there’s nothing as important as finding food. Nicole Bloom movingly recalls her distressing time on the streets, amongst the poor people of Melbourne, when riding on the bus is a luxury.
creator_credit_for_label: Nicole Bloom, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
description: When you’re poor, there’s nothing as important as finding food. Nicole Bloom movingly recalls her distressing time on the streets, amongst the poor people of Melbourne, when riding on the bus is a luxury.
